title: Broker-dealer licenses and registrations
dataVerified: Licensee name, FINRA CRD number, registration date, firm affiliation, disciplinary history summary
dataVisibleAfterVerification: Shows the issuer domain and the responder text (e.g., "Valid ID" or "Denied").
rationale: Revocable status tracking for broker credentials. Domain binding verifies FINRA/SEC legitimacy. Prevents fake broker credentials in investment fraud. Investor protection through verification. BrokerCheck integration for public lookup. Wallet card format for client meetings. Critical for investor protection where broker credential verification prevents fraud by barred individuals.
